verses.verse: <S%G2228><s%> Know ye not <S%G50><s%> <S%G5719><s%>, brethren <S%G80><s%>, (for <S%G1063><s%> I speak <S%G2980><s%> <S%G5719><s%> to them that know <S%G1097><s%> <S%G5723><s%> the Torah <S%G3551><s%>,) how that <S%G3754><s%> the Torah <S%G3551><s%> hath dominion over <S%G2961><s%> <S%G5719><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> as long as <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3745><s%> <S%G5550><s%> he liveth <S%G2198><s%> <S%G5719><s%>?

For <S%G1063><s%> the woman <S%G1135><s%> which hath an husband <S%G5220><s%> is bound <S%G1210><s%> <S%G5769><s%> by the Torah <S%G3551><s%> to her husband <S%G435><s%> so long as he liveth <S%G2198><s%> <S%G5723><s%>; but <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> the husband <S%G435><s%> be dead <S%G599><s%> <S%G5632><s%>, she is loosed <S%G2673><s%> <S%G5769><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the Torah <S%G3551><s%> of her husband <S%G435><s%>.

So then <S%G686><s%> <S%G3767><s%> if <S%G1437><s%>, while her husband <S%G435><s%> liveth <S%G2198><s%> <S%G5723><s%>, she be married <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5638><s%> to another <S%G2087><s%> man <S%G435><s%>, she shall be called <S%G5537><s%> <S%G5692><s%> an adulteress <S%G3428><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> her husband <S%G435><s%> be dead <S%G599><s%> <S%G5632><s%>, she is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> free <S%G1658><s%> from <S%G575><s%> that Torah <S%G3551><s%>; so that she <S%G846><s%> is <S%G1511><s%> <S%G5750><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> adulteress <S%G3428><s%>, though she be married <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5637><s%> to another <S%G2087><s%> man <S%G435><s%>.

Wherefore <S%G5620><s%>, my <S%G3450><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%>, ye <S%G5210><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> are become dead <S%G2289><s%> <S%G5681><s%> to the Torah <S%G3551><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the body <S%G4983><s%> of Moshiach <S%G5547><s%>; that <S%G1519><s%> ye <S%G5209><s%> should be married <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5635><s%> to another <S%G2087><s%>, even to him who is raised <S%G1453><s%> <S%G5685><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the dead <S%G3498><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> we should bring forth fruit <S%G2592><s%> <S%G5661><s%> unto 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> we were <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%>, the motions <S%G3804><s%> of sins <S%G266><s%>, which <S%G3588><s%> were by <S%G1223><s%> the Torah <S%G3551><s%>, did work <S%G1754><s%> <S%G5710><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> members <S%G3196><s%> to bring <S%G1519><s%> forth fruit <S%G2592><s%> <S%G5658><s%> unto death <S%G2288><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> now <S%G3570><s%> we are delivered <S%G2673><s%> <S%G5681><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the Torah <S%G3551><s%>, that being dead <S%G599><s%> <S%G5631><s%> <S%G5625><s%> <S%G599><s%> <S%G5631><s%> wherein <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739><s%> we were held <S%G2722><s%> <S%G5712><s%>; that <S%G5620><s%> we <S%G2248><s%> should serve <S%G1398><s%> <S%G5721><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> newness <S%G2538><s%> of spirit <S%G4151><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> in the oldness <S%G3821><s%> of the letter <S%G1121><s%>.

What <S%G5101><s%> shall we say <S%G2046><s%> <S%G5692><s%> then <S%G3767><s%>? Is the Torah <S%G3551><s%> sin <S%G266><s%>? 'Elohim forbid <S%G3361><s%> <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5636><s%>. Nay <S%G235><s%>, I had <S%G1097><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> known <S%G1097><s%> <S%G5627><s%> sin <S%G266><s%>, but <S%G1508><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the Torah <S%G3551><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> <S%G5037><s%> I had <S%G1492><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> known <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5715><s%> lust <S%G1939><s%>, except <S%G1508><s%> the Torah <S%G3551><s%> had said <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5707><s%>, Thou shalt <S%G1937><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> covet <S%G1937><s%> <S%G5692><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> sin <S%G266><s%>, taking <S%G2983><s%> <S%G5631><s%> occasion <S%G874><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the Mitzvah <S%G1785><s%>, wrought <S%G2716><s%> <S%G5662><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> me <S%G1698><s%> all manner of <S%G3956><s%> concupiscence <S%G1939><s%>. For <S%G1063><s%> without <S%G5565><s%> the Torah <S%G3551><s%> sin <S%G266><s%> was dead <S%G3498><s%>.

For <S%G1161><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> was alive <S%G2198><s%> <S%G5707><s%> without <S%G5565><s%> the Torah <S%G3551><s%> once <S%G4218><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> when the Mitzvah <S%G1785><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5631><s%>, sin <S%G266><s%> revived <S%G326><s%> <S%G5656><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> died <S%G599><s%> <S%G5627><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the Mitzvah <S%G1785><s%>, which <S%G3588><s%> was ordained to <S%G1519><s%> life <S%G2222><s%>, I <S%G3427><s%> found <S%G2147><s%> <S%G5681><s%> <S%G3778><s%> to be unto <S%G1519><s%> death <S%G2288><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> sin <S%G266><s%>, taking <S%G2983><s%> <S%G5631><s%> occasion <S%G874><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the Mitzvah <S%G1785><s%>, deceived <S%G1818><s%> <S%G5656><s%> me <S%G3165><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> it <S%G846><s%> slew <S%G615><s%> <S%G5656><s%> me.

Wherefore <S%G5620><s%> <S%G3303><s%> the Torah <S%G3551><s%> is holy <S%G40><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the Mitzvah <S%G1785><s%> holy <S%G40><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> just <S%G1342><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> good <S%G18><s%>.

Was then <S%G3767><s%> that which is good <S%G18><s%> made <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5754><s%> death <S%G2288><s%> unto me <S%G1698><s%>? 'Elohim forbid <S%G3361><s%> <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5636><s%>. But <S%G235><s%> sin <S%G266><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> it might appear <S%G5316><s%> <S%G5652><s%> sin <S%G266><s%>, working <S%G2716><s%> <S%G5740><s%> death <S%G2288><s%> in me <S%G3427><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> that which is good <S%G18><s%>; that <S%G2443><s%> sin <S%G266><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the Mitzvah <S%G1785><s%> might become <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5638><s%> exceeding <S%G2596><s%> <S%G5236><s%> sinful <S%G268><s%>.

If <S%G1487><s%> then <S%G1161><s%> I do <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5719><s%> that <S%G5124><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> I would <S%G2309><s%> <S%G5719><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>, I consent <S%G4852><s%> <S%G5748><s%> unto the Torah <S%G3551><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> it is good <S%G2570><s%>.

Now <S%G3570><s%> then <S%G1161><s%> it is no more <S%G3765><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> that do <S%G2716><s%> <S%G5736><s%> it <S%G846><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> sin <S%G266><s%> that dwelleth <S%G3611><s%> <S%G5723><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> me <S%G1698><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> I know <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5758><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> me <S%G1698><s%> (that is <S%G5123><s%> <S%G5748><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%>,) dwelleth <S%G3611><s%> <S%G5719><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> good thing <S%G18><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> to will <S%G2309><s%> <S%G5721><s%> is present <S%G3873><s%> <S%G5736><s%> with me <S%G3427><s%>; but <S%G1161><s%> how to perform <S%G2716><s%> <S%G5738><s%> that which is good <S%G2570><s%> I find <S%G2147><s%> <S%G5719><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>.
For <S%G1063><s%> I delight <S%G4913><s%> <S%G5736><s%> in the Torah <S%G3551><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the inward <S%G2080><s%> man <S%G444><s%>:

But <S%G1161><s%> I see <S%G991><s%> <S%G5719><s%> another <S%G2087><s%> Torah <S%G3551><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> members <S%G3196><s%>, warring against <S%G497><s%> <S%G5740><s%> the Torah <S%G3551><s%> of my <S%G3450><s%> mind <S%G3563><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> bringing <S%G163><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> into captivity <S%G163><s%> <S%G5723><s%> to the Torah <S%G3551><s%> of sin <S%G266><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is <S%G5607><s%> <S%G5752><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> members <S%G3196><s%>.

O wretched <S%G5005><s%> man <S%G444><s%> that I am <S%G1473><s%>! who <S%G5101><s%> shall deliver <S%G4506><s%> <S%G5695><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the body <S%G4983><s%> of this <S%G5127><s%> death <S%G2288><s%>?

I thank <S%G2168><s%> <S%G5719><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> YY <S%G2962><s%>. So then <S%G686><s%> <S%G3767><s%> with the mind <S%G3563><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> myself <S%G846><s%> serve <S%G3303><s%> <S%G1398><s%> <S%G5719><s%> the Torah <S%G3551><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>; but <S%G1161><s%> with the flesh <S%G4561><s%> the Torah <S%G3551><s%> of sin <S%G266><s%>.
